title: Phone keeps restarting and sometimes the bootloader screen to ask me to "Try Again" or Fac Reset
content: I have done one factory reset with no joy.  I have restarted in safe mode and it seems to work.  Then it will get hot and restart and often ask me to Try again or attempt a factory reset on the bootloader screen.  I cannot make a phone call in normal mode, I used to be able to connect to a headset and that worked but as of late that option is not working as well as I had hoped.  Bluetooth wont connect to anything and keeps turning off.  I have plenty of memory 50% and have been using a cache cleaner to try and keep it working but seems its not  Help
